#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstring>

#define MAXX 1001

using namespace std;

int dp[MAXX];

void cal_catalan(){

    dp[0]=dp[1]=1;

    for(int i=2;i<=MAXX;i++){

        for(int j=1;j<i;j++){

            dp[i]+=dp[j]*dp[i-j];
            dp[i]%=10000;
        }
    }

}


int main(){
    int T,N;

    cal_catalan();
    cin>>T;

    while(T--){
        cin>>N;
        cout<<dp[N]<<endl;;

    }

    return 0;
}
